Uses of Class
com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features.AbstractPosTaggerFeature

  • Packages that use AbstractPosTaggerFeature 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features
    Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.
    The available feature descriptors are listed in PosTaggerFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)

    • Uses of AbstractPosTaggerFeature in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features

      Subclasses of AbstractPosTaggerFeature in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPosTaggedTokenAddressFunction
      An empty abstract class for easily creating address functions.
      class  HistoryAbsoluteAddressFunction
      Returns a pos-tagged token from the current history by its absolute index in the sentence.
      class  HistoryCountIfFeature
      Counts the pos-tagged tokens within a certain range matching a certain criterion.
      The range is given in absolute indexes.
      If start > end, returns null.
      If no end is provided, assumes it should go till end of the current history.
      class  HistorySearchFeature
      Returns the first token in a given range which matches a certain criterion, or null if no such token is found.
      If a start index is provided as a second argument, will start looking at this index, otherwise at the current token's index-1.
      If an end index is provided as a third argument, will continue until the end index, otherwise until token 0.
      All indexes must be <= the current history size, otherwise only valid indexes will be looked at.
      If start index >= end index, will look backwards, otherwise will look forwards.
      class  NgramFeature
      Retrieves the tags assigned to the previous N tokens.
      Will only return results if the current index >= N-2 (to avoid multiple start tokens).
      This ensures that we don't repeat exactly the same information in 4-grams, trigrams, bigrams, etc.
      class  PosTaggerHistoryAddressFunction
      Returns a pos-tagged token in the current history, at a position relative to the current token.
